text: Ærest of Twyforde suðward andlang Auene ðære ea swa ðæt mynstre stondeð ofer Alne stream on Cronochomme.
And swa andlang ea on ða mærdic Fledanbyrig gemære.
Andlang ðære dic swa upp on ða ecgge, and swa þurh ðone graf be ðan aldan swinhagan.
Ðæt upp on Lencdune.
Swa andlang dune ðæt cymð ðær Lencgemeru and Herefordtunes landgemæru togædere liggað æt Wænnancumbe.
Ðæt swa dun on ðone fulan broc.
Andlang broces on ðæt lytle sic.
Andlang sices on Auene.
Upp andlang Auene ðæt on blacan pol.
Of ðam poole up on ða ecgge, on piceres homm.
Of piceres homme swa on ðæt lytle sceard ðæt is on burhhlinceas.
Of ðam hlincean on Bugghilde stræte.
Ðanon on þegna dene, on stanihtan hyll.
Of ðam hylle on cyricstige.
Of cyricstige on ða blacan þyrnan on easthalfan lytel.
Of ðære þyrnan on ðone blacan pytt, andlang furena on mærðyrnan.
Ðanon on mærdic.
Of mærdic on ða wæterswylian.
Of ðære swylian on mærðorn.
Of ðam þorne on ða lytlan grenan dic.
Of ðare dic on Hunigburnan.
Swa andlang streames on ðam stanihtan ford.
Eft on Bugghilde stret.
Of ðære stret westward on ælfstanes byriels.
Of ðam byrielse andlang sices on bunewyrðe.
Of bunewyrðe on Hunigburnan.
Of Hunigburnan on mæredic.
Of mæredic on Baggenbeorge.
Of Baggenbeorge eft on mæredic.
Of mæredic on Wynburnan.
Of Wynburnan onlong heafde on ðam beadan þorn.
Of ðam þorne on wudanhomme.
Of wudamhomme on polðorne.
Of polðorne on Fugelmære.
Of Fugelmære on mærebroc.
Onlong broces on ða blacan þyrne.
Of ðere þyrne onlong broces on burhwyllen.
Of burwylle on burwealles.
Onlong wealles eft on þeoua dene.
Of þeoua dene on Eadelming garan.
Of Ealdelming garan bi Buggild strete ðe men nonesmonneslond nemmeð.
Ðonen onlong weige west to ðe beorges.
Of ðen beorges on pycrestan.
Of pycrestane onlong walles on Cadanmynster.
Of Cadanmynstre on blacan pytt.
Of ðam pytte onlong riðies on wyllersege.
Of wylleresegge on sandbroc.
Of sandbroc onlong furena on hegwege.
Of hegewege on norðom.
Of norðomme on bordriðig.
Ðanon on brerðyrnan.
Of ðere þyrna on hecanige.
Of hecanige on Bedeswyllan.
Of ðe wyllen innan ða lytlam þyrnan on westhalue piccedeshoo.
Of ðere þyrnan on mærðorn.
Of mærðorne on Weremundes lawe, onlong furena on Weremodes lawe.
Ðonan on Egsanmore on ðe grendic.
Of ðere dic on bradan mere.
Of bradan mære on ðone lytle grene bearh.
Ðonan onlong heafde upon langendune.
Swa on ða ealda foxhole.
Of ðane hole onlong hricgweges on ða æðenan byrielse, on Ealhmunding wege.
Of ðam wege eft ongean æfter dune ðæt it cymð upp on ðone cnolle.
So æfter furlange ðæt it cymð on ða fyrdstræt.
Swa æfter stræte ðat hyt cymð on potingdun.
Ðanon on þrittig æcera.
Of ðam þrittig æcera on ricwege.
Of ricwege on ða ealdan dic.
Onlong dices ðæt on Esigburnan.
Of Esigburnan upp to ðere ealdan dic.
Of ðere dic on Wylihtmede.
Of ðer mæde on mærebroc.
Onlong broces on domnipol.
Of ðe pole on Ellesbeorh.
Of ðam beorohge on merwyllan.
Of merwylle ðæt hyt cymð eft on geriht on Auene.
